div.p: RICOTIA in botany: A genus of the ſiliquoſa order, belonging to the tetradynamia claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 39th order, Siliquoſ æ . The ſiliqua is unilocular, oblong, and com-preſſed, with plain valvules.
